questions: Can you describe your current role and responsibilities in detail?
What specific skills and expertise will you bring to the position?
How does your previous work experience qualify you for this role?
What achievements in your career are you most proud of?
What is your understanding of the role you've been offered?
Why did you choose this particular company and position?
What are the terms of your employment contract?
How does this position align with your career progression?
What do you know about the industry sector in our country?
How does your expertise match the local market needs?
What research have you done about the local business environment?
How do you plan to adapt to the local work culture?
What are your long-term career goals in this country?
How long do you plan to stay in this position?
What skills do you hope to develop in this role?
How will this experience contribute to your career development?
What arrangements have you made for accommodation?
Are you familiar with the cost of living in this area?
Have you researched the local healthcare and insurance requirements?
What support will you need to settle in the country?
